name: Shapeless 2019
description:
Graduation Video Game 
School : ISART DIGITAL, the Video Game and 3D Animation / VFX School

Well-known works of art are being deteriorated by a crazy painter!
You embody the paint-creature who will be able to restore their original appearance and escape this creepy workshop

Platform : PC 
Engine : Unreal Engine 
Number of players : 1
Genre : Puzzle Adventure

Producer : Sophie Maleval
Game Art : Josselin Large, Alice Leclerc, Alexandre Mahmoudi-Vigreux, Sahra Mekhaemar
Game Programming : Vincent Lafon, Enzo Sounou
Music & Sound Design : Guillaume D'arcy-Orga
